R Tutorials - some notes João Pedro Cruz 2023-05-15 Preface In this book, we will introduce usefull techinques: rmarkdown, exams (for moodle), bookdown, and git. It’s a work in progress started around 2023-05-16 in Granada. Acknowledgements: M. Montero-Alonso, A. Freitas, C. Miranda.
